reviews.text: I just checked out of this hotel today after 4-nights' stay.
reviews.title: A good hotel for those willing to adapt

reviews.text: People: this hotel is geared towards Japanese travelers, so if you are not willing to adapt to the Japanese way, don't stay here. After all, a Japanese traveler would not expect the staff at an American hotel to speak their language. The staff do speak some English, but it depends on who, and being Japanese, they are reserved and may appear unwilling to help. They do try to accommodate as best as they can -- if you ask.
reviews.title: Good hotel in great location in Shibuya

reviews.text: I am thankful to past reviewers for pointing the way to this hotel. Really, in Tokyo this is a gem of a find. The location is ideal. I am not the slickest when it comes to finding my ways around in a strange city, but the location is so great that I was able to get around easily.
reviews.title: Efficient, Great Location, Quiet, and Clean
Cockroaches
reviews.text: I will not repeat what others have already said, but -- while the memory is still fresh -- let me add a few things that may be helpful to others.
For my laptop, the ethernet connection works better than the wifi.
reviews.title: great location, ok room
